posts.post_title: FS: T202 Hassan 1/3 Folder TY COBB (Cobb Steals Third) $275
posts.post_content:
For sale the middle section of a T202 Cobb steal third. The Ends are obviously cut off, but a nice chance for an affordable Cobb for someone.

Offered at $275 net to me PayPal FF method preferred.
Add 7.50 for shipping.


Thank you,
Connor
